comments: Noncomposites (A008578) with prime (A000040) subscripts. a(n) = noncomposite(prime(n)) = A008578(A000040(n)). Subsequence of A175248 (noncomposites (A008578) with noncomposite (A008578) subscripts), a(n) = A175248(n+1). a(n) U A175249(n) = A008578(n). [From _Jaroslav Krizek_, Mar 13 2010]
example: a(5) = 29 because a(5) = q(p(5)) = q(11) = 29, p = prime, q = noncomposite. [From _Jaroslav Krizek_, Mar 13 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 10 2000
